comments.en:
12 pages/min, 15 sec until the first page comes out, 2 x 250 sheet, max. page size is Legal, built-in duplex unit. PostScript module, network card (included in "N" model), additional paper trays, envelope feeder available as options. 2 MB standard, expandable to 50 MB with 4MB or 16MB 60/70ns EDO or FastPage SIMMs.
Understands PCL 5e and PJL, so one can use it with standard Ghostscript drivers and PJL utilities (as PUP), but one can also use the proprietary printing software "CentreWare" (for LPD or LPRng systems, see section for downloadable software, platform "UNIX" on the printer's web page).

Consumables/Refills: Toner Cartridge (15000 pages), Drum Cartridge (30000 pages)
